SUMMARY

Hello! My name is Kowsika, and I am currently a second-year Bachelor of Science student, majoring in Computer Science. With a keen interest in technology and programming, I am passionate about learning new skills and exploring innovative solutions in the tech world. My academic journey has equipped me with a strong foundation in computer science principles, and I am eager to apply my knowledge in real-world projects and internships. Beyond academics, I enjoy reading books, which helps me stay balanced and motivated. I am excited about the future and look forward to contributing to the ever-evolving field of computer science.

PROJECT EXPERIENCE
